title: An Act relative to patient access to certain health care services

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Lawn of Watertown, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2477) of John J. Lawn, Jr. relative to competent interpreter services in acute-care hospitals.  Public Health.
